Function Documentation

function pot_matrix ( in  ef_obj,
in  discret_matrix_size,
in  potential_points_idx,
in  potential_points_iidx,
in  P,
in  method 
)

pot_matrix creates matrix for potential equation using list of points

Parameters:
discret_matrix_size side size of matrix
potential_points_idx index use to potential computing
potential_points_iidx index to first col of pidx where boundary is set
P map of permittivity distribution
method - method of calculation of coefficients 'gauss' - (default) using gauss law (integral eqation) 'kirchhof' - calculating potential using capacitor mesh and Kirchhof law 'finite difference' - not implemented
Return values:
A(pixnum,pixnum) where pixnum is the number of unknown potential points
